verbs.description: [ARG1: CPAC chairman Matt Schlapp] [V: appeared] [ARGM-LOC: on CNN] [ARGM-PRP: to explain for his disdain for Michelle Wolf 's monologue at the White House Correspondents Dinner] — and received a marathon pummeling from New Day hosts Chris Cuomo and Alisyn Camerota given President Donald Trump 's frequent offensive remarks about women .
